product_name: SportHill Ultimate Visibility Zip Top - Men's - 2012 Overstock
long_description: Cold-weather athletes training in low light will love the features of the men's Sporthill Ultimate Visibility zip top: lots of reflectivity for safety, deep ventilating and warm performance fabric. The stretchy, quick-drying and moisture-wicking fabric in the body and arms keep you warm and comfortable during intense activity, and chest, side and arm panels breathe well. Deep 12 in. front zipper with internal windflap and zipper garage lets you control ventilation. Thumbholes let you secure the sleeves over hands and wrists for warmth. Raglan sleeves eliminate shoulder seams for increased range of motion and comfort. Slim, athletic cut of the SportHill Ultimate Visibility zip top adds support, wicks moisture and keeps you warm. Overstock.
short_description: Cold-weather athletes training in low light will love the features of the men's Sporthill Ultimate Visibility zip top: lots of reflectivity for safety, deep ventilating and warm performance fabric.
